taskbody.context: The following steps will show you how to add time entries in Clockify.

step.cmd: The first page you will see when you sign in to your Clockify account is the time tracker page.(Figure 1).
You will have a blank project waiting for you. Every project needs a title before you can begin. Click the title section and give your project a name.
To the right of the start button there are two icons that control timer mode or manual entries.
When you are ready to track time click the blue start button.
